project.ItemDescriptionShort: Slight balance changes and inventory stack sizes increased
project.Title: Experimental Austin's Mod
project.ItemDescription:
The goal of this mod is to reduce some of artificial difficulty imposed by inventory management and curve the difficulty with minor rule changes and character balances.
[h1]Rules Changes[/h1] [list] [*] Affliction/Virtue chance is now 50/50 chance from 75/25 [*] Stress reduction from killing blow is now 5 from 3 [*] Stress reduction chance on killing blow is now 80% from 50% [*] Stress reduction from critical hit is now 5 from 3 [*] Stress reduction chance for companions on critical strike is now 50% from 25% [*] Stress damage at lower light levels is slightly lower (-5) [*] Player crit chance at lower light levels now matches monster crit changes increases (light) [+0, +1, +2, +3, +5] (dark) [*] Chance of a negative quirk on successfully mission has been lowered [*] The max number of locked positive quirks has been increased to 5 [/list]
[h1]Quirks Changes[/h1] [list] [*] Fated (chance to convert a miss into hit) change raised from 10% to 20% [/list]
[h1]Heroes[/h1] [b]Grave Robber[/b] [list] [*] Chance to crit increased by 1% at all weapon levels [*] Shadow Fade +10 dodge duration increased from 4 rounds to 5 [*] Shadow Fade +% crit chance increased from [+4%, +5%, +6%, +7%, +8%] to [+12%, +14%, +16%, +18%, +20%] [*] Poison Dart blight damage increased from [2, 3, 3, 3, 4] to [2, 3, 3, 4, 5] [*] Poison Dart blight resist debuff now lasts 4 rounds to match the blight duration [*] Lunge accuracy increased by 5% at all levels [*] Toxic Trickery now has a self heal of 1 at all levels [*] Increased weapon weapon damage for final upgrade from [7 - 14] to [8 - 14] [/list]
[b]Hellion[/b] [list] [*] Slightly increased damage for all weapon upgrades [/list]
[b]Highwayman[/b] [list] [*] Point Blank Shot now has accuracy increased by 5% at all levels [/list]
[b]HoundMaster[/b] [list] [*] Hound's Harry now does slightly more bleed from [1, 1, 2, 2, 3] to [1, 2, 3, 3, 4] [*] Howl now has 100% chance to hit, raised from [66, 68, 70, 72, 74] but stress reduction was lowered from [2, 3, 4, 5, 6] to [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] [*] Howl now also applies a stress reduction buff with values [-5%, -5%, -6%, -6%, -7%] [*] Howl can now be used from pos [4,3,2] was [4,3] [/list]
[b]Occultist[/b] [list] [*] Wyrd Reconstruction now has a minimum heal of [1, 1, 2, 2, 3] [/list]
[b]Flagellant[/b] [list] [*] Exsanguinate now has accuracy increased by 5% at all levels [/list]
[h1]Inventory[/h1] [list] [*] Portrait stack increased to 3 to 8 [*] Bust stack increased to 6 to 12 [*] Crest stack increased to 12 to 20 [*] Deed stack increased to 6 to 12 [*] Trapezohedron stack increased to 3 [*] Pewrelic stack increased to 3 [*] Holy Relic stack increased to 3 [*] Grain sack stack increased to 3 [*] Torch stack increased to 16 [*] Shovel stack increased to 6 [*] Provision stack increased to 24 [*] Firewood stack increased to 5 [*] The Blood stack increased to 9 [*] The Cure stack increased to 9 [/list]
[h1]Nomad Wagon[/h1] [list] [*] Nomad Wagon has a chance to sell Crimson Court and Ancestral trinkets at 1.0% and 0.5% respectfully [*] Nomad Wagon trinket count can now be upgraded a 5th time for 64 crests allowing 16 trinkets to appear [*] Nomad Wagon discount upgrade can now be purchased 2 more times for 56 and 64 crests respectfully [/list]
[h1]Stage Coach[/h1] [list] [*] Number of recruits has been increased at all levels by 1 except 2 recruits still appear initially [*] Roster Size has been increased by 4 at all levels [/list]
[h1]Sanitarium[/h1] [list] [*] Positive quirk lock costs reduced by 500 at all levels [*] Negative quirk removal costs reduced by 250 at all levels [*] Removal of locked negative quirks reduced by 500 at all levels [/list]
[h1]Campaign[/h1] [list] [*] Resolve level restrictions completely removed [/list]
[h1]Starting Roster[/h1] [*] Reynauld now starts with quirk 'Hard Skinned' [*] Dismas now starts with quirk 'Deadly'
